actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to allow the deduction for retirement savings to be computed for married individuals on the basis of their combined compensation.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow the deduction for retirement savings to be computed for married individuals on the basis of their combined compensation.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to allow the deduction for retirement savings to be computed for married individuals on the basis of their combined compensation.
